website_summaries.verdict: This digital caliper gives you a quick and accurate reading without annoying fluctuations or unhelpful decimal readouts.
pros: Easily converts between inches, millimeters and fractions
Auto-off helps to conserve battery life
Provides an accurate reading that doesn't fluctuate
cons: The thumb wheel can be a little loose, causing the caliper to slide slightly during use

customer_reviews.title: Good calipers, but somewhat fragile.
customer_reviews.text: This caliper worked well until about 5 months after purchase when they just fell apart unexpectedly. Not sure how but the bushing that let it slide with some slight friction fell out, which caused it to just slide all the way open and fall apart when I picked them up one day. Mind you, they still work, but the slide mechanism has almost no friction so you have to actively apply pressure to keep an accurate reading of what you're measuring and the fall apart pretty easily now.
customer_reviews.author: Packratt

customer_reviews.title: Caliper points aren't straight or symmetric
customer_reviews.text: One of the pointed jaws of the caliper is cut so that the point is ~.02" back from the edge of the surface. This appears to be a sloppy manufacturing defect that should have been caught by quality control. The result is that it is impossible to use the pointed tips to take an accurate measurement, and instead you can only use the flat surfaces of the caliper. If you need to take accurate measurements, I recommend purchasing a higher quality product- you wont be happy with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Corgster

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended....Another tool that makes life much simpler; well built and lots of features
customer_reviews.text: I am a shade tree mechanic with three vehicles; all older models that are used for various reasons. Commuter, recreation, hauling stuff. I am always searching for the right socket or buying replacement parts for different hoses which I need accurate measurements. Before it was trial and error, now I just measure with the caliper and I am done. It has settings for fractions, metric, and decimal. Very well built and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Lofar

customer_reviews.title: Loved it while it worked and now love that the seller replaced it immediately.
customer_reviews.text: Update: seller responded and will replace the device without question in less than 24 hours. Loved it while it worked, certainly exceeds what i need; but i use it sparingly; after sitting unused for several months; it didn't turn on. I replaced the battery and it would work for a few seconds and then act like a computer that was trying to reboot; the LCD would just show nonsense. i tried a brand new battery from the store; same thing. it will seem to work while i hold the battery clip between my fingers but as soon as i ever so gently tighten the screw for the clip, the LCD goes nuts. Would love to hear what I'm doing wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Steve McHargue

customer_reviews.title: LCD Defective
customer_reviews.text: After a long internet search of calipers, I decided to purchase this one after good reviews from multiple sources. Sadly I went to use this one and the lcd screen was missing multiple parts of the display making it unable to read. Changed out the battery with several new ones but still the same. Quality control should have caught this right off. Packaging was sufficient so I don't think it was damaged in shipping. Returned for a refund, (Amazon was great as always) and going to try an upgrade to a better unit.
customer_reviews.author: JKB

customer_reviews.title: My calipers did come with a defect that is easily fixed. I'm giving four stars primarily because of ...
customer_reviews.text: My calipers did come with a defect that is easily fixed. I'm giving four stars primarily because of the customer service. These folks went above and beyond the call of duty to make sure I'm a satisfied customer. I've just rarely seen such outstanding customer service. New calipers on the way , and if they work out well, I will upgrade to five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: replace a 300.00 set with this
customer_reviews.text: Had my everyday set, for 20 years, paid big bucks (Digital wasn't around then), now only using it for my reloading work vs everyday engineering. However, I dropped them, and damage them. Ughhh , since I wasn't doing engineering anymore, I tried these and compared with my backup set, these are dead on, and so far work every time. They also make having to us a chart for mm vs inch a thing of the past. What can I say, I'm very very surprised and pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Rockbase

customer_reviews.title: D.O.A.
customer_reviews.text: Dead out of the box. Tried the new in package included battery also..... still nothing. I'm returning for another brand. This thing is also super heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: Has a nice feel and weight in your hand
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item to help me measure small increments, as my eye sight is changing. I have only used it a few times so far, but I very much like it. It has a nice sturdy feel and smooth movement. Simple to use and easy to read. Gives accurate measurements and comes in a nice blow molded case for protection. A friend of mine commented on the nice feel in your hand. The vendor is very attentive to your happiness with the product and sent an email with complete operation manual and hints for use and care. I would recommend this Caliper.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D

customer_reviews.title: Nicest set of calipers that I have ever used.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a number of calipers out there, and these calipers are cream of the crop. Best I have ever used. I was actually surprised by the quality. The fit and finish is nice, they open and close smoothly, and I am fairly convinced that the accuracy is right on based on measurements of known parts. I would not hesitate to buy these again, and am probably going to order up a second set as a backup. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a quality unit
customer_reviews.text: I only open the package 5 minutes ago and I felt immediately like I need a quick review of my first impression. They seem to be very well built and they are attractive though that is not an attribute I look for in calipers. I'm not an everyday user of calipers so it might be awhile before I know how their accuracy is. Not sure if it is a pro or con but they are quite heavy. Certainly the heaviest I have ever held. I will update this review after I use them for a bit.
customer_reviews.author: billV

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the few dollars more
customer_reviews.text: My use for this caliper is principally in reloading ammunition and related measurements. I questioned paying a few dollars more for this one but was impressed by its features and warranty. The one I replaced cost a few dollars less but was devoid of some features and just died for no apparent reason since it had been used in a climate controlled environment for about a year. It is a pleasure to use and the warranty gives me a comfort level that was not the case with previous digital calipers. In short, this is a good example of the old saying, "Penny wise and pound foolish."
customer_reviews.author: Soothsayer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product - Exceptional customer care
customer_reviews.text: This family owned USA company is ultra-high integrity and excellent customer care. Their product worked perfectly out of the box and has instructions for ongoing use and care. The versatility of this device for measurement conversion between mm to inches in decimals or inches in fractions makes this a solid choice for any application. I highly recommend buying high quality calipers from this vendor!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen of the West

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: The product itself has been great, no complaints at all. The customer service though is outstanding. I lost one of the small screws holding the battery case on when changing the battery and reached out to EAGems to ask about the screw specifications to replace it. They sent me a new screw free of charge and were very communicative over email. Would definitely buy from again.
customer_reviews.author: Holden Gatsby

customer_reviews.title: Very Handy Tool
customer_reviews.text: I am completely satisfied with these digital calipers. Although they are delicate instruments they appear to be very well made. In addition to that it is supplied with a very nice protective case (which I faithfully store the calipers in when I am not using them). I use them a lot for measuring small drill bits that are too small to be marked with their size. It is especially handy that the readout can be switched from metric, to SAE, and even to fractions.
customer_reviews.author: MDS Patient

customer_reviews.title: Accuracy is fine but the unit I purchased failed because the retaining ...
customer_reviews.text: Accuracy is fine but the unit I purchased failed because the retaining clip on the caliper rail failed. You only get a short return window on this product so I would advise you to look for different manufacturer or seller. I did not abuse this tool in any way. It appears I have a broken tool and no chance to get my $$ back.
customer_reviews.author: Nicks Family

customer_reviews.title: Great functioning calipers for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Not a single complaint about this caliper so far. Readings are very accurate, having tested with various feeler gauges, and the 3 modes are easy to use. It's holding up well for this woodworker's needs so far.
customer_reviews.author: Andy the Woodworker

customer_reviews.title: Measurement Options were the icing on the cake
customer_reviews.text: I am a hobbyist woodworker had been researching digital calipers to try and find one that was reasonably affordable without sacrificing accuracy or usability. The EAGems caliper was a perfect fit. My favorite nice feature, which is not available on all affordable calipers, is the ability to measure three ways - decimal inches, fractional inches, and metric. In addition to my woodworking, I had to go through a pile of loose drill bits from an Imperial AND metric set and figure out what each was - the EAGems caliper was the perfect tool. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Ray

customer_reviews.title: Best I Own
customer_reviews.text: Best yet. I now own 3 of these calipers and this is the best of the lot. The metal jaws are far superior to plastic and I like having fractional and decimal inch measurements. Movement is very smooth and the lock locks.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Seyler

customer_reviews.title: Display not showing top half of the numbers
customer_reviews.text: Product was broken upon arrival. The low battery indicator was displayed upon arrival also, so i used the spare battery that came in the box to troubleshoot if it was a power issue. Same results- The top half of the measuring digits would not display. No damage to shipping box. Made in China. I'm replacing it with a cheaper digital caliper that has better comparison reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Alex J.

customer_reviews.title: Accurate but uses battery when not in use.
customer_reviews.text: This caliper was better built and more accurate then I expected, I find myself using it a lot. What I don't like it is that it is apparently always on in a semi sleep mode. It does this I think so that it can come on automatically when slide moves. That's cool but, but sitting in your cabinet will drain the battery. Have spare batteries around or you be using your dial caliper. Battery is CR2032
customer_reviews.author: ABQMED

customer_reviews.title: Great choice of digital caliper--EAGems
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this for about a week, but have used it several times. It has a nice clear display and easy to use. The display will go to 64th's in fraction mode and is easy to switch to decimal or metric mode. Seems to be very accurate. It has a nice container and comes with a spare battery and even a small screwdriver to remove the battery cover. I've had some follow-up from the seller concerning proper use and care and seems to be genuinely concerned if I was to have any issues with this digital caliper.
customer_reviews.author: JimBob

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: This Digital Caliper is Excellent in Quality and Value-Priced considering that it includes a spare battery and carrying case. It has a very smooth function of setting measurement with calipers and the digital readout is very legible. The company has an excellent follow-up system to insure that purchaser is happy with the Digital Caliper and I trust that if there were any issues to resolve they would be very timely in responding. I would highly recommend these Calipers based on the overall quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: Indypendent1

customer_reviews.title: I think this is A good deal.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to pick up another Caliper, my other one is made of carbonfiber it works well, but I wanted something that would not erode from use, I picked this one it does everything I request, I have tested it and recalibrated several times ie: scope adjustments, and it was on target each time, it needs A lock on it, once you take A measurement, that was my only extra wish. God Bless.....Jim.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: I Love It !!
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality instrument at a very affordable price. I use it all of the time in my workshop. It appears to be accurate to a couple of thousandths which is fine for my uses. I really appreciate the ability to switch the display between mm, inches and fractions of an inch.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Higgins

customer_reviews.title: I'm a happy buyer!
customer_reviews.text: I am a retired tradesman and have always bought Mitutoyo, but with my older eyes I needed something easy to read, this IP54 digital calipers by EAGems is perfect! The accuracy matches my expensive Mitutoyo. Thank you to EAGems owners ED and Rhonda for your emails that give me the peace of mind that you stand by your product.
customer_reviews.author: Jayvee

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: The calipers look and feel like they are of a high quality. I have only had them for a few weeks, but they are very easy to use and read. I checked them against some steel rulers and measuring tapes, and they were accurate. Everything needed, including a small screw driver and spare battery, is included in the case. I also received 4 emails as part of there follow up, which included a digital copy of the Owner's Manual, tips and suggestions and an offer of extended warranty, although the extra warranty only seemed available if I signed up to receive marketing emails. I ordered them from country Victoria in Australia, and this was hassle free and delivery was prompt.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Denson

customer_reviews.title: Measured as it should
customer_reviews.text: I won't use this much but there are times I wish I had one in the past. It feels very sturdy and well made. easy to use and a pretty solid case. it comes with an extra battery and a small screwdriver to change said battery. The mini screwdriver doesn't fit perfectly in the case but no biggie. I like the product and am happy I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Thunderking666

customer_reviews.title: It looked good, well made
customer_reviews.text: It looked good, well made, and worked well. I used it rarely, maybe 6 times. And after about 6 months the LCD stopped working. Now it is worthless. I guess you get what you pay for. If only they repaired it, but for the cost, I imagine it is cheaper to buy a new one. Addendum: After writing the above comment, some one from the company wrote me apologizing for the problem, and is sending me a replacement. Anyone who cares this much about their product gets a big thank you from me. That is customer service as it should be, and i say thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Laurence U. Schenk

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting based on the reviews
customer_reviews.text: This product may be the perfect low priced digital caliper for those not doing precision work. Within 2 minutes of removing it from the package, the jaws wiggled from side to side. This is not what one expects for a precision digital caliper. I sent it back and ordered another from Japan. This EAGems is from China.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Fosselman

customer_reviews.title: Does Exactly What I Want it To.
customer_reviews.text: Came in a nice case with a good warranty, appears to be pretty well made. This could be a rebranded product, but if it is, I can't tell. Compared the measurements to other more expensive units and they appear to be dead on the money. This product pretty much lives in a drawere until I need it. So it has had a pretty easy life. Zeroing was no problem, it practically came zeroed from the company. Easy to use, pretty simple instructions. It really does everything I want it to do, both internal and external measurements.
customer_reviews.author: David C. Matheson

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy to read
customer_reviews.text: Have struggled all my life with manual/analog caliper/micrometer. This was a splurge and I'm not sure how I ever got along without it now. How accurate is only a guess on my part as I have nothing to compare it to, but it sure is much easier to read and use than anything I've ever owned before. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen C. Bosshardt

customer_reviews.title: Great, accurate device
customer_reviews.text: Great, accurate device. Good fit and finish for the money. Far cheaper than a M___ unit, far better than the cheapo H__ F__ unit. Love the fractional inch setting--works well with carpentry projects, where 1/16th inch is good enuf for gummint work. Save the decimals for mechanical measurements, both Metric and English. Only wish the case was better. It's functional, but just. Still haven't replaced the battery--a good sign since this thing is always in standby mode, never fully off to maintain the zero setting.
customer_reviews.author: Cap Drayman

customer_reviews.title: Very okay, it just is too sensitive
customer_reviews.text: I was after something that could record very precise measurements and it sometimes does it. I think it may just move too easily. If it locked better and securely, or perhaps if it was easier to lock. In the action of locking is usually when I lose the accurate numbers. It is just too easy to lose the measurements. It works great when I have my wife to read the measurement before it moves. When taking the measurements for what I am working on, I don’t have both hands to dedicate to locking it and often times the screen isn’t facing me when measuring, so I don’t see it right away.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew pri

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and value
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a few weeks now, and really love this tool. Easy to use, love the facility to switch between fractions, digital inches and metric. Only complaint is the case - very cheaply made. But at this price point, a good compromise.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good starter set on a budget
customer_reviews.text: They mabe from Chania, but they check out against my BROWN & SHARPS so far in all applications of general shop use, Can't complain as they are well made in its construction and materials. Good starter set on a budget..
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Of Augusta

customer_reviews.title: Battery door won’t open!
customer_reviews.text: Reads okay but it’s a nightmare to change the battery; you cannot simply just open the battery door and replace it when it runs out of battery. It’s typical cheap Chinese knock-off’s! Don’t buy it!
customer_reviews.author: AzongLee

customer_reviews.title: Lock the slide when transporting in case.
customer_reviews.text: Very good device for the price. I carry it around and measure all kinds of random things. It is pretty accurate for what it is. I compare it to known objects and is has never had any consistency issues. The caliper automatically turns on when yo open it. Nice feature with the exception being you need to lock the device when storing and transporting. Any small bump may cause it to turn on and stay on, burning through your battery.
customer_reviews.author: A News

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, worked for just a few months.
customer_reviews.text: We hardly had used this when it would not shut off, then shortly thereafter it went completely wacky, with readings that were not correct, could not zero it, could not control it. we can't use it at all now, the numbers bounce all over the place and show nothing of use. looked nice when coming out of box, but now, just trash.
customer_reviews.author: Badbobik

customer_reviews.title: Consistent, accurate, and user-friendly calipers
customer_reviews.text: I bought these calipers to do precision measurements with which any error could be dangerous. The calipers give consistent reads on an easy-to-read digital display. The sliding action of the calipers is smooth, and the design is quite ergonomic. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan G. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Gr3eat product at a great price. All stainless - - no plastic parts ...
customer_reviews.text: Gr3eat product at a great price. All stainless - - no plastic parts so more than some others, but well worth it!!! Great molded plastic case. Comes with a spare battery and screwdriver in the case to change the battery. Unfortunately, the precision measuring people either made the case cutout to small or the screwdriver too big, so it doesn't fit into the slot. I was able to cut/sand enough of the end of the driver handle to fix that.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Very good tool
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the caliper and the way it worked. The large readout helps make accurate measurements. The only criticism is the wheel used for the detail and precision adjustments slips while I was using it. This seems to be a small price to pay for the money and the utility.
customer_reviews.author: C. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Digital Caliper!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality tool except no matter how I put the battery in the meter will not work!! Updating feedback!! This Company replaced this tool, and as I thought it is a very high quality tool. It rolls smoothly and meter is very accurate! I highly recommend this tool and the awesome service from the Company!! Gordon Mills
customer_reviews.author: Gordon G. Mills

customer_reviews.title: Well made / Great value
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box, very pleased with the accuracy, functionality, feel, fit and finish. Great value for the price. None of the issues mentioned by others. Would not hesitate to buy again and will recommend to friends. Also, impressed that I received an email, before the unit arrived, from the seller with instructions on use, FAQ&As and with contact info if I had concerns or problems with the unit.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: He keeps leaving these at jobsites!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing caliper. My engineer loves it. Keeps losing it at job sites tho, so I will have to keep buying him replacements. Other than him losing it, this product is great and is easy to read and very user friendly to use.
customer_reviews.author: the.jen.man

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great shipping and great product. Much better quality then I was expecting. Entire thing is metal, I was expecting the display housing to be plastic, but it's metal too. Measure pretty accurate as well, thousands sometimes fluctuates +/- .001/.002, but that's ok for me.
customer_reviews.author: daniel r haller

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars on accuracy just because rarely it’s off but this is a great buy. The most it’s ever been off is 0.005. I use this for reloading ammo so I need it to be precise. It’s not perfect each and every time but it’s easy to use, easy to read, decent price and easy to reset if I feel like it’s not correct, but even then it’s never off by much. Comes in a sturdy case as well which I know will keep it safe. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Silva

customer_reviews.title: Spot on Accurate Down to 5/10,000
customer_reviews.text: Extreemely effective. Though the caliper has a slight wobble to it at the end, the jaws can slide against the other, it doesnt seem to affect measurement much. I've tested the accuracy of it with aerospace grade 440c SS rod stock, grade 10 tungsten carbide bearing balls, and grade 5 silicon nitride bearing balls. It has been spot on every time, even down to the 5/10,000 mark. Cheap (relatively) Accurate Easy to use What else do you want? Comes in a nice hard case too.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus D.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this for the price point. I’m using it for designing my own very simple parts for 3D printing. I don’t need extreme precision, but this has been plenty accurate for me down to 0.01 mm. As good as an instrument 10X the price? Probably not, but I don’t care. This is good enough for my hobbyist needs.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Battery dies too quick.
customer_reviews.text: Work great. Only problem is that this thing kills the battery in less than a week of sitting. I use it about 1 time every month. And every time I have to install a new battery. Seems to die in a week.
customer_reviews.author: joey lsell

customer_reviews.title: Good caliper for a good price
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty nice set of calipers. I work in the toolmaking industry so I have a set of Mitutoyo calipers at work that are considered top of the line. While these are no Mitutoyos, they certainly compete well enough. Really solid construction and good accuracy for a reasonable price. No complaints here!
customer_reviews.author: Dana S.

customer_reviews.title: A very accurate and easy to use device
customer_reviews.text: In my work I'm required to make precision cuts with very close tolerances in wood and metals. I use the IP54 Digital Caliper every day. I purchased it some time ago and it is as accurate as the day I received it. This caliper is easy to use and read. If you are someone like me who appreciates good tools, you will appreciate this tool. I don't mind spending good money for good tools, in this case I received a quality tool for a very reasonable price. I would recommend the IP54 Digital Caliper to anyone, I trust it. Al
customer_reviews.author: Al La Sala

customer_reviews.title: Look no further, this is the one.
customer_reviews.text: Customer service is superb. I was looking for a 5 star micrometer, I did not want to mess around with a cheap one that had up and down reviews. This thing is accurate to the .0005 used it all day. Checked the calibration with a feeler gauge. Right on the money. Tool feels strong durable and expensive. Very well built. Extra battery, screw driver and 3 year warranty, what more do you want. Great tool, don't bother with the $20 ones. I'm a avid Amazon shopper and professional engine builder.
customer_reviews.author: T-bone

customer_reviews.title: well made and very accurate
customer_reviews.text: I've used it on the production floor as my personal tool, and it not only looks better than most of the expensive company-owned calps, it's more accurate that half of them. Came with a spare battery which was a cool plus, and being in an industrial environment I've only just begun to beat it up, but it looks tough enough to take the abuse.
customer_reviews.author: PopRox

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great calipers for the price. Well built with good materials, accurate and the hard case is good. Definitely recommend to those looking for a nice reliable pair of inexpensive calipers.
customer_reviews.author: Mark J. Wilder

customer_reviews.title: Seem to be good quality
customer_reviews.text: The calipers look and feel like a quality tool. I chose these based on other reviews and the hard case that came with them. I can't review the accuracy or the actual use as I purchased this as a gift for my brother in law who lives on the left coast. He seemed pleased with it though.
customer_reviews.author: Scott H

customer_reviews.title: Great product and value
customer_reviews.text: After so many years using my old Vernier, this digital caliper makes me feel in heaven, specially now that my vision isn't what it used to be at close distances. The product is all that the seller claims it to be. I have no complaints and I feel that my measurements are more accurate.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bauza

customer_reviews.title: I haven't had a chance to use this caliper yet ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a chance to use this caliper yet. When I start to reload my Ammo I will follow up with a review. With that said it does seem to be Quality but until I use it I can't say for sure. UPDATE: 3/31/17 After receiving the calipers I was very happy to see them being made of quality metal and accurate. I check them with my friends calipers he spent over $100 for and they are accurate. I use them to measure each precise bullet I make and they're accurate. I can't say enough about these calipers other than if I need another one I know where to get them.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Z

customer_reviews.title: read my comments
customer_reviews.text: they work great, can't beet the price. 4 stars you need to get use to the way the # are displayed example ( the way I'm use to 1.000 5) These are 1.0 then small # 005 . I get confused. Just look close at the picture for the display before buying. is all I'm saying. Again the price 2 year warranty Quality workmen ship all 5 stars (just reading the display 4 stars)
customer_reviews.author: KNN.

customer_reviews.title: Was pleasantly surprised that it was already in great shape, no burrs on the edges
customer_reviews.text: Read lots of reviews of calipers and was expecting to need to do some clean up work to smooth edges and etc. Was pleasantly surprised that it was already in great shape, no burrs on the edges. Looks good and works easily. Dealing with wood working it is so nice to have a display that reads 7/16 instead of me having to have a fractional chart to see what wood dimension it is. As a bonus it is in a nice plastic case so I don't have to worry about it getting damaged laying on my workbench. Just wish that I bought this a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: James Tate

customer_reviews.title: Precision instrument exceeds expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with the delivery and presentation of the caliper. The build feels sturdy and robust and I am very confident in its measurement capabilities. The fine adjustment exudes accuracy. The carrying case is likewise built to last and the addition of a second battery ensures that I will not be left without a valuable tool when the initial battery loses its charge. The color scheme of the caliper along with the color of the cases make identification significantly easier than similar devices which are also present in my environment. Very courteous communication from the manufacturer. Eager for feedback of their product, they assumed a proactive role, immediately reaching out and sharing a digital best practices manual.
customer_reviews.author: primarydirective

customer_reviews.title: Quality tool
customer_reviews.text: Quality tool that is very easy to use and read and at a very good price. The company owners go the extra mile and check with you to be sure everything went well and that you know how to properly use the product. Should have bought one of these years ago after struggling to measure circumstances and objects with rounded edges with a tape measure. This is so fast and more importantly accurate.
customer_reviews.author: W. A. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Not a good-feeling pair of calipers
customer_reviews.text: Feels a little crunchy, mechanism is not smooth like one might expect to find in a pair of calipers that cost $40. Packaging otherwise fine, we'll call it cost effective but otherwise unremarkable. Logo is a bit gaudy.
customer_reviews.author: Clark Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Seem to be well made, and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I love the fraction feature. Trying to convert milimeters and Thousands to a fraction was always a problem. Now it is a click of a button. I am one happy camper folks!
customer_reviews.author: elaine

customer_reviews.title: Verry happy with these
customer_reviews.text: Was unsure when I bought them but after receiving them I really like the quality and the accuracy of them. The extra battery was a shock to find in the box.
customer_reviews.author: seulater

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I'd expect for the money paid.
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid, easy to use and accurate enough for my uses device. I'm using it for finding sizes for bicycle parts that I'm working on and it hasn't been wrong yet. Like any tool it's only as good as the user.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: This product was shipped with the battery access cover screw broken so there's no way to install a battery. The return window is closed, so this product is scrap metal.
customer_reviews.author: fd_prof

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad that I bought the more expensive digital caliper, it is a quality tool which will last for years. I've been using it to check the advertised sizes of some parts I ordered and my readings match the advertised sizes. This is a tight,yet smooth precision tool. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: garry v

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: This caliper is very easy to use and is accurate. The digital display is easy to read even for these old eyes and will read out in fractions or decimals, whichever you choose. Of course it can read inside or outside measurements as well. The readings are always repeatable. Great tool for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Zaphod42

customer_reviews.title: Works great and comes with extras.
customer_reviews.text: I admittedly have only used these a couple of times and they are very well made and work great. Comes in a hard plastic case with some extras. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: A. dinz

customer_reviews.title: A Handy Digital Caliper
customer_reviews.text: I've used mechanical calipers for many years. I was attracted to EAG digital caliper because of price, value and favorable reviews. Caliper fractions are not something I'm accustomed to and was excited to experiment. Very impressive tool that maintains zero and quickly provides conversions for metric and fractions. A very satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: William D.

customer_reviews.title: A solid good quality item at a fair price.
customer_reviews.text: Really worked well for me seem to be very solid and precise. Easy to use two buttons on/off and zero. Shipped fast all in all very happy
customer_reviews.author: Gumby

customer_reviews.title: Deal with a person!
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery! Much better "feel" than the product it replaced. I have no reference blocks so I can't vouch for accuracy, but it is consistent. Manual addressed the negative comments from other users. (Reading manuals is a lost art) Was wonderfull communicating with an honest to goodness human being who cared about their product.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Bower

customer_reviews.title: For the money these are great
customer_reviews.text: I have these in my work truck for checking items I am working on. They work as they were intended to and I will buy them again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Twin Hull Captain

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Digital Caliper
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly & is accurate & consistent. I am impressed with the caliper's quality & I appreciate the carry case as well as the little added touches of the extra battery & screw driver for changing the battery. It's imported by a family company and they follow up personally and are anxious to resolve any problem, although I have experienced no problem whatsoever with my new caliper..
customer_reviews.author: J. Brown

customer_reviews.title: MEASURES BOTH INCHES AND METRIC UNITS
customer_reviews.text: I use the precision caliper in my home shop. Nowadays, metric fittings and projects are equally as common as the traditional American English system. The caliper switches between systems with ease and is now my first choice for critical measurements.
customer_reviews.author: M. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Great caliper
customer_reviews.text: I've used it several times so far. It's easy to use, calibrate, and switch between SAE and metric. Feels like a quality instrument too.
customer_reviews.author: mike durham

customer_reviews.title: Everyone at the shop is jealous!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a machining class I was taking, but they're such good quality that I use them at work now too. Slides smoothly, measurements are repeatable every time, and the fractional inch reading really comes in handy sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected - Great Quality with good quality. Update: Based on my recent use, this caliper is easy to use and accurate for my needs. I would recommend this caliper to others.
customer_reviews.author: Richard F Ryland

customer_reviews.title: Good features good price
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily, it works well, I like the option of metric, decimal inch or fraction. I like that it takes a 2032 battery, it is a little larger case but not intrusive
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy E Thompson

customer_reviews.title: I like the automatic on/off feature + the choice of mm
customer_reviews.text: Compared to my previous digital calipers that I used constantly in my work, I like the automatic on/off feature + the choice of mm, decimal inches, and fractional inches, since I use all 3 measurements and I get tired of having to use a calculator for conversions. They also seem to be more accurate than my previous digital cal. tested alongside my very expensive dial calipers. Excellent product at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Hogg

customer_reviews.title: Good product backed by excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: I use it frequently in my shop and like the ability to get reading in fractions, decimals and metric. When I lost a small screw the seller offered a prompt replacement free of charge! Excellent customer service!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bart

customer_reviews.title: ... a woodworker and this caliper suits my needs just fine. I have not had it long enough to ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a woodworker and this caliper suits my needs just fine. I have not had it long enough to see how long the battery will last. The last one I bought (from a different seller, different manufacturer) used up the battery very quick even while it was turned off. Time will tell
customer_reviews.author: hammer

customer_reviews.title: As far as I know the caliper accuracy is correct.
customer_reviews.text: I use the devices to ensure that the 9mm bullets that I am reloading are the correct length for the gun I am using. I have no way to verify the 0,001 accuracy readings on the device. I do check each bullet I prepare using a case gauge prior to shooting the bullet. At this time I have not had any reason to doubt the accuracy of the caliper.
customer_reviews.author: Skip Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size.
customer_reviews.text: I use this to measure parts and various setups were I need reasonable accuracy for programming CNC machine setups.
customer_reviews.author: R. S. Rehmel

customer_reviews.title: How well the gauge slides on the scale rail and jaws align properly.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived when stated. Nicely made, attention to detail quality materials. Would recommend this to friends. Attention was given to packaging for shipping.
customer_reviews.author: T. F. Maurer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: A very nice and easy to use digital micrometer. The layout of the functional buttons is nice. The case to store the unit is also well made.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel S Eppelsheimer

customer_reviews.title: EAGems digital caliper
customer_reviews.text: This digital caliper from EAGems is very nice and looks awesome, i’ve used it a couple of times and each time its been pretty accurate, the case however is not as nice as quality and the screwdriver does not fit properly in the case but other than that its good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Digital Calipers
customer_reviews.text: I have used dial and digital calipers for over 20 years. Recently I purchased this digital caliper to have at the house when I was needing to have a precious measurement on my firearms, such as the sights to make sure the side to side measurements are equal. If a sight is off even .0325 or 1/32", that could equal being off target about 5".
customer_reviews.author: Johnnie C.

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Used this almost every day to check bolts, drills, holes, etc. Goes in mm, decimal parts of inch or fractional part of inch. Very nice product use it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: I lost my Mitutoyo caliper when my house flooded. I'm retired now so only used it occasionally. Didn't want to spend much on a new one. These are perfect for me. They are accurate. Mine slide smoothly. I'm fine with the case and happy they came with a spare battery and screw driver. Overall I'm pleased with this purchase and hope I don't have to buy another in my lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: PMR

customer_reviews.title: Great for a hobbyist, if not for a precision machine shop.
customer_reviews.text: These work really well and though I don't do high precision machining, I do like to have decent accuracy and this provides just what I need to make my work around my hobby shop a little easier. The digital read out works great as it zero's out nicely and all the functions work as described.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Still waiting to put instrument to work. However I am impressed with the feel and the quality. Will likely followup.
customer_reviews.author: whirlwind

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: While I have only used it a couple of times, it works very well and seems to provide the accuracy of much higher priced tools.
customer_reviews.author: HLC51

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS THE ONE.  Period.
customer_reviews.text: SUPER communication from seller! It works perfectly! SUPERB instructions (and communications from the seller)! This seller went THE EXTRA MILE to make something we would think of as simplistic (but you know, you always kinda wonder what IS the best way to do this with this thing)! Extra battery, even a tool to help! DON'T EVEN GO ANYWHERE ELSE unless you're into spend 10 times as much - and you really don't need to - this one does it SUPERBLY!
customer_reviews.author: Linwood S. Hines

customer_reviews.title: best caliper I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I like that its turns on when move it and shuts off on its own use for reloading well made and accurate
customer_reviews.author: Cindy B.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I just had a chance to use these calipers while doing a project on a lathe, for the price they seem to work very well no problems with going back to zero and they repeat measurements accurately. I have only used them once so i will have to see how they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: JTT

customer_reviews.title: Best one out there hands down
customer_reviews.text: Affordable and no tinker toy electronix, reliable and solid , This is my 2nd one for other location
customer_reviews.author: kindshuh

customer_reviews.title: Good device, almost as accurate as claimed, crappy case.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Heavy feel. Repeatability is good, not quite the 0.01mm advertised more like 0.02mm but fine for my purposes. I like the metric/english options. Works well for thickness, ID, OD measurements. The case, packing, and documentation is complete crap, but the device itself seems good. In particular I would have like a nicer case that fit the device better.
customer_reviews.author: John Lilley

customer_reviews.title: Better then I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Given the low price, i expected a really cheap product. Well I was wrong. It’s worth the money. If it falls apart down the road, I’ll change my review. Oh yes, the box it comes in, is nothing to brag about but it does it’s job.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Jay

product_meta.title: Digital Caliper, Durable Stainless Steel Electronic Measuring Tool by EAGems; Get IP54 Protection and Precision Fractional Measurements in SAE/Metric, 6 inch/150mm with these Large LCD Vernier Caliper
feature_bullets: MANY DIGITAL CALIPERS CAN BE INACCURATE, arrive with dead or weak batteries or have a rough or sticky movement. Our all stainless steel caliper glides smoothly, with accuracy to within .0005 inch, .01 millimeter, 1/64." It has automatic on/off and the IP54 rating provides a great level of liquid and dust resistance. You can purchase it with confidence and your experience using it will be enjoyable and trouble-free.

HIGHER QUALITY AND VALUE AT A GREAT PRICE. No more frustration from imprecise measurements, or difficulty reading the lines; you get fine precision on a large easy to read LCD screen. The metal lasts longer than calipers with plastic or carbon fiber parts. It is used by professionals and hobbyists alike, by jewelers, hobbyists, woodworkers, machinists, DIY, automotive mechanics and more.

YOUR TIME IS VALUABLE. Stop wasting it trying to find different tools to measure SAE or Metric parts, it easily converts between inches, millimeters and fractions in one hand-tool, plus measures inside + outside dimensions, diameters, steps, and has a depth gauge. Zero it at any point for differential measuring; easily locatable in the protective bright red case.

SUPERB CUSTOMER SERVICE is there to support you for any questions or problems. Electronic devices can sometimes fail but this one has a very low failure rate. EAGems offers tips on usage and care. If failure or problems do occur, you're covered with a minimum 2-year warranty and hassle-free refund or replacement. We want to ensure the best experience for our customers.
EAGems is a family-owned and operated business. We strive to offer excellent products to our customers. Just reach out to us to get help with any tips, questions or issues.
